allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix workflow: remove unused pin card, improve commit reliability

Remove pin card step that generated an unused SVG for a third-party repo.
Replace error-swallowing `|| exit 0` with `git diff --staged --quiet` guard
and add `git pull --rebase` before push to prevent race condition failures.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Use -X theirs on rebase to resolve SVG conflicts automatically

Freshly generated SVGs should always win over previous versions when
concurrent workflow runs cause rebase conflicts.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
